snippet: An affidavit says Usaamah Rahim and two others hatched a terrorism plot on a Rhode Island beach, including plans to target the police, two days before Mr. Rahim was killed in Boston.
abstract: Americans David Wright and Nicholas Rovinski are arrested by law enforcement officials and face conspiracy charges related to aiding Islamic State militant group; two men have been linked to Usaamah Rahim, who was fatally shot in Boston after threatening police with a large knife.
lead_paragraph: An affidavit says Usaamah Rahim and two others hatched a terrorism plot on a Rhode Island beach, including plans to target the police, two days before Mr. Rahim was killed in Boston.

headline.main: Authorities Cite Plan by 3 Men to Aid ISIS
